H0.text: Who was British Prime Minister between Winston Churchill’s two terms in office. Clement Attlee's predecessor, Neville Chamberlain

H1.text: Who was British Prime Minister between Winston Churchill’s two terms in office. Anthony Eden

H2.text: Who was British Prime Minister between Winston Churchill’s two terms in office. Ernest Bevin

H3.text: Who was British Prime Minister between Winston Churchill’s two terms in office. Attlee

A4.text: Clement Richard Attlee, 1st Earl Attlee (3 January 1883 – 8 October 1967), was a British statesman who was Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1945 to 1951 and Leader of the Labour Party from 1935 to 1955.
